text: Marco Heering (born 8 May 1970) is a retired Dutch footballer who played as a forward for Go Ahead Eagles, Willem II and Fortuna Sittard. He is currently working as assistant manager and under-21 manager at Almere City. ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:Go Ahead Eagles players Category:Fortuna Sittard players Category:Sportspeople from Apeldoorn Category:Association football forwards
title: Marco Heering
